nodes.text: The Nardithi Nightsisters were a subgroup of the Nightsisters who lived on the planet Dathomir. An Inquisitor of the Galactic Empire visiting the world encountered the Nardithi Nightsister Jerserra and  attempted to train the latter, having seen her potential as an apprentice who would help to conspire against other Inquisitors. However, Jerserra eventually betrayed her master.
